alert.note: Alert for North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:33AM PST until December 28 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...ANOTHER ROUND OF SNOW TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY... .As one system departs today, another arrives tonight to bring light snow across the area. Most of the snowfall is expected tonight into Tuesday morning then decrease Tuesday afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...North Oregon Coast. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to noon PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
